name: Test Case 2 : Store Dropdown Menu Visibility
descriptionHtml:
Test Case Description:

Validate that once we mouse overing to the stores module in the home page all the dropdown options are opening or not?

Expeceted Results:

All the dropdown options should show once we mouse hovering to stores module in the home page.
